00018 #include "cmodulechooserbutton.h"
00019 #include "resource.h"
00020 #include "backend/cswordbackend.h"

00031 CModuleChooserButton::CModuleChooserButton(CSwordModuleInfo* useModule,CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type, const int id, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00032     : KToolBarButton("", id, parent,name),m_popup(0) {
00033 //  qDebug("CModuleChooserButton::CModuleCHooserButton");
00034 
00035     m_id = id;
00036     m_moduleType = type;    
00037     m_module = useModule;
00038     if (!m_module)
00039     m_hasModule = false;
00040   else
00041     m_hasModule = true;
00042     
00043     setIcon( iconName() );
00044     setPopupDelay(0);
00045 
00046     populateMenu();
00047 }   
00048 
00050 const QString CModuleChooserButton::iconName(){
00051     switch (m_moduleType) {
00052         case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00053             if (m_hasModule)
00054                 return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ICON_MC);
00055             else
00056                 return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ADD_ICON_MC);
00057         case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00058             if (m_hasModule)
00059                 return QString::fromLatin1(COMMENTARY_ICON_MC);
00060             else
00061                 return QString::fromLatin1(COMMENTARY_ICON_MC);
00062         case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00063             if (m_hasModule)
00064                 return QString::fromLatin1(LEXICON_ICON_MC);
00065             else
00066                 return QString::fromLatin1(LEXICON_ADD_ICON_MC);
00067         case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00068             if (m_hasModule)
00069                 return QString::fromLatin1(BOOK_ICON_MC);
00070             else
00071                 return QString::fromLatin1(BOOK_ADD_ICON_MC);
00072         default:
00073             return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ICON_MC);
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 CSwordModuleInfo* CModuleChooserButton::module() {
00078     for ( KPopupMenu* popup = m_submenus.first(); popup; popup = m_submenus.next() ) {
00079 
00080     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < popup->count(); i++) {
00081         if ( m_popup->isItemChecked(popup->idAt(i)) ){
00082                 QString mod = popup->text(popup->idAt(i));
00083             return backend()->findModuleByName( mod.left(mod.find(" ")) );
00084             }
00085     }   
00086 
00087     }
00088     return 0; //"none" selected
00089 }
00090 
00092 int CModuleChooserButton::getId() const{
00093     return m_id;
00094 }
00095 
00097 void CModuleChooserButton::moduleChosen( int ID ){  
00098     for ( KPopupMenu* popup = m_submenus.first(); popup; popup = m_submenus.next() ) {
00099 
00100     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < popup->count(); i++){
00101         popup->setItemChecked(popup->idAt(i),false);    
00102     }   
00103     popup->setItemChecked(ID, true);
00104     }
00105 
00106     if (m_popup->text(ID) == i18n("NONE")) { // note: this is for m_popup, the toplevel!
00107         if (m_hasModule) {
00108             emit sigRemoveButton(m_id);
00109             return;
00110         }
00111     }
00112     else {
00113       if (!m_hasModule)
00114         emit sigAddButton();
00115         m_hasModule = true;     
00116         m_module = module();
00117         setIcon(iconName());
00118     emit sigChanged();
00119         
00120     QToolTip::remove(this);
00121     if (module())
00122         QToolTip::add(this, module()->name());
00123     }
00124 }
00126 void CModuleChooserButton::populateMenu(){
00127     if (m_popup)
00128         delete m_popup;
00129     m_submenus.setAutoDelete(true);
00130     m_submenus.clear();
00131 
00132     //create popup
00133     m_popup = new KPopupMenu(this); 
00134     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Select additional modules"));    
00135     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00136     m_popup->insertItem(i18n("NONE"));
00137     m_popup->insertSeparator(); 
00138     connect(m_popup, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(moduleChosen(int)));        
00139     setPopup(m_popup);
00140 
00141     QStringList languages;
00142     QDict<KPopupMenu> langdict;
00143 
00144 
00145     ListCSwordModuleInfo& modules = backend()->moduleList();
00146     for (modules.first(); modules.current(); modules.next()) {
00147         if (modules.current()->type() == m_moduleType) {
00148             QString lang = QString::fromLatin1(modules.current()->module()->Lang());
00149             if (lang.isEmpty())
00150                 lang = QString::fromLatin1("xx"); //unknwon language -- not use English as default!!
00151             if (languages.find( lang ) == languages.end() ){ //not yet added
00152                 languages += lang;
00153                 KPopupMenu* menu = new KPopupMenu;
00154                 langdict.insert(lang, menu );
00155                 m_submenus.append(menu);
00156                 connect(menu, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(moduleChosen(int)));       
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }   
00160     //Check the appropriate entry
00161     for (modules.first(); modules.current(); modules.next()) {
00162         if (modules.current()->type() == m_moduleType) {
00163             QString lang = QString::fromLatin1(modules.current()->module()->Lang());
00164             if (lang.isEmpty())
00165                 lang = QString::fromLatin1("xx"); //unknown language
00166             QString name = QString(modules.current()->name()) + QString(" ")+
00167                 (modules.current()->isLocked() ? i18n("[locked]") : QString::null);             
00168             int id = langdict[lang]->insertItem( name );
00169             if ( m_module && modules.current()->name() == m_module->name()) {
00170                 langdict[lang]->setItemChecked(id,true);
00171             }
00172         }
00173     }   
00174     if ( !m_module ) {
00175         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00176             if (m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) == i18n("NONE") )
00177                 m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),true);
00178                 break;
00179         }
00180     }
00181 
00182     languages.sort();
00183 
00184   for ( QStringList::Iterator it = languages.begin(); it != languages.end(); ++it ) {
00185         m_popup->insertItem( *it, langdict[*it]);
00186     }
00187 
00188 }
